meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with a sweet, juicy flesh and a large seed inside.
meanings.sent1: I love eating mangos on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: She bought a basket of mangos from the market.
meanings.sent3: The mangos at the picnic were so popular, they disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: The bright yellow color of the mangos reminded her of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The scent of ripe mangos filled the kitchen, making her mouth water.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'mango', referring to multiple fruits.
meanings.sent1: We shared the mangos among all the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on mangos this week.
meanings.sent3: The kids were excited to have a mango-eating contest with the mangos.
meanings.sent4: The bowl overflowed with colorful mangos, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the ripe mangos filled the room, enticing everyone to try one.
